src:
【富二代露鳥57秒3】熱戀白富美　周予天又親密緊黏吳克群女友
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 娛樂組, 攝影組
本刊曾如此報導，年紀比吳克群小13歲的女友陳語安竟在今年的中秋夜，與周予天親密勾脖貼胸，充滿曖昧的粉紅泡泡。











當時吳克群選擇相信女友，更親上火線護愛，他的字句如此寫道：「每個人都有自己獨立的生活圈跟交朋友的自由。」
至於2015年發過專輯的歌手周予天，傳他正與名媛錢德月的女兒董若彤（ Tiffany）熱戀中，而且戀情公開，一起出席家庭旅遊且預支蜜月，小倆口在親友間也受到祝福。當時本刊接獲讀者提供的爆料照片，兩小無猜的情侶在雪地中緊握彼此雙手，情濃且熾熱。


憑著自己的高富帥，周予天也混進社交名流圈，曾跟孫芸芸合照。（翻攝自周予天IG）

不只感情得意，據傳父親有意安排周予天於南加大經濟系畢業後，接管房地產家族企業。外型高大挺拔的周予天，除了身高186公分，也練出精實的六塊肌，生理條件優異。
更新時間｜2019.11.05 11:44
text:
[Fu II generation of exposed birds 57 seconds 3] love Bai Fumei Zhou Yutian and intimately cling to Wu Kequn girlfriend
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Entertainment Group, Photography Group
This magazine once reported that Chen Yuan, a 13-year-old girlfriend who was younger than Wu Kequn, was intimately tied to Zhou Yutian on this Mid-Autumn Night this year, full of sly pink bubbles.











At that time, Wu Kequn chose to trust his girlfriend and kissed the fire line to protect his love. His words read: "Everyone has their own independent life circle and the freedom to make friends."
As for the singer Zhou Yutian who sent the album in 2015, he is fascinated by the daughter of the famous lady Qian Deyue, Tiffany, and his love is open, attending family trips and pre-supporting honeymoon, and the couple are blessed among relatives and friends. At that time, the magazine received a photo of the broke by the readers. Two couples who had no guessing clasped each other's hands in the snow, and they were rich and hot.


With his own rich and handsome, Zhou Yutian also mixed into the social celebrity circle, and had a photo with Sun Wei. (Review from Zhou Yutian IG)

Not only is it emotionally pleasing, it is said that his father intended to arrange Zhou Yutian to take over the real estate family business after graduating from the Economics Department of the Southern Ministry of Economics. Zhou Yutian, who is tall and tall, has a solid six-piece muscle in addition to his height of 186 cm. His physiological condition is excellent.
Update time|2019.11.05 11:44
